feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
